title: An Action Hero
writer: Anirudh Iyer, Gaibandhar Chele Raton, Neeraj Yadav
short_cast: Ayushmann Khurrana, Jaideep Ahlawat, Neeraj Madhav, Harsh Chhaya, Gautum Joglekar, Vaquar Shaikh, Sumit Singh, Jitendra Hooda
cast: Ayushmann Khurrana, Jaideep Ahlawat, Neeraj Madhav, Harsh Chhaya, Gautum Joglekar, Vaquar Shaikh, Sumit Singh, Jitendra Hooda
genre: Hindi-Language Movies, Bollywood Movies, Action & Adventure, Comedies

desc: A murder accusation turns a movie star's own life into an eccentric action thriller as he flees the country, with a vengeful politician hot on his heels.
